summary: Provides Lightning callbacks that render training, validation, testing, and prediction progress using console‑based progress bars. Includes implementations based on the Rich library with custom columns, theming, and infinite‑task handling, as well as a tqdm‑based version with lightweight iteration tracking utilities.
business_intent: Enhance user visibility into model training workflows by delivering clear, customizable progress indicators, thereby improving monitoring, debugging, and overall user experience for PyTorch Lightning users.
